comment.author: 86047400@N07
comment._content:
This photo wasa taken at the very bottom of High Street, St. John's, Antigua, looking eastward. The building on the left is the Treasury and Library. The building on the left is the abatoir. The pier and landing platform are behind the photographer.
Ambassador Lionel Hurst (ret)
(maxhurst@aol.com)

comment.author: 85803536@N03
comment._content: I thought the library was on the right.
